unnormalised: Last year, during the monsoon, my entire family down with dengue. Dr. Sharma from the local govt. hospital, PHC, was so helpful. She visited our area, distributed mosquito nets, and gave a talk about preventing mosquito breeding. She even explained the symptoms of dengue in simple terms. We were given ORS packets and told to visit the PHC if fever persisted beyond 3 days. Thanks to her efforts, things improved quickly. The PHC also conducted a free dengue test camp on 15/08/2023.
normalised: Last year, during the monsoon, my entire family down with dengue. Doctor Sharma from the local government hospital, P-H-C, was so helpful. She visited our area, distributed mosquito nets, and gave a talk about preventing mosquito breeding. She even explained the symptoms of dengue in simple terms. We were given O-R-S packets and told to visit the P-H-C if fever persisted beyond three days. Thanks to her efforts, things improved quickly. The P-H-C also conducted a free dengue test camp on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three.
